author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: عَلَى انْعِدامِها، وَالَّذِيْ عَرَفَكَ لا يَنْظُرُ إِلى غَيْرِكَ وَلا يُرِيدُ مِنْكَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ مُنْتَهَى أَمَلِ الآمِلِينَ وَغايَةُ رَجآءِ المُخْلِصِينَ،
translation: Whosoever hath recognized Thee will turn to none save Thee, and will seek from Thee naught else except Thyself. Thou art the sole Desire of the heart of him whose thoughts are fixed on Thee, and the highest Aspiration of whosoever is wholly devoted unto Thee.
